verses.verse: It is a good<WH2896> thing to give thanks<WH3034> to Yahweh,<WH3068> to sing praises<WH2167> to your name,<WH8034> Most High;<WH5945>
to proclaim<WH5046> your loving kindness<WH2617> in the morning,<WH1242> and your faithfulness<WH530> every night,<WH3915>
with the ten-stringed<WH6218> lute,<WH5035> with the harp, and with the melody<WH1902> of the lyre.<WH3658>
For you,<WH3068> Yahweh, have made me glad<WH8055> through your work.<WH6467> I will triumph<WH7442> in the works<WH4639> of your hands.<WH3027>
How great<WH1431> are your works,<WH4639> Yahweh!<WH3068> Your thoughts<WH4284> are very<WH3966> deep.<WH6009>
A senseless<WH1198> man<WH376> doesn't<WH3045> know, neither does a fool<WH3684> understand this:<WH995>
though the wicked<WH7563> spring<WH6524> up as the grass,<WH6212> and all the evildoers<WH205> <WH6466> flourish,<WH6692> they will be destroyed<WH8045> forever.<WH5703>
But you,<WH3068> Yahweh, are on high<WH4791> forevermore.<WH5769>
For,<WH341> behold, your enemies, Yahweh,<WH3068> for,<WH341> behold, your enemies shall perish.<WH6> All the evildoers<WH205> <WH6466> will be scattered.<WH6504>
But you have exalted my horn<WH7161> like that of the wild ox.<WH7214> I am anointed<WH1101> with fresh<WH7488> oil.<WH8081>
My eye<WH5869> has also seen<WH5027> my enemies.<WH7790> My ears<WH241> have heard<WH8085> of the wicked<WH7489> enemies who rise up against me.<WH6965>
The righteous<WH6662> shall flourish<WH6524> like the palm tree.<WH8558> He will grow<WH7685> like a cedar<WH730> in Lebanon.<WH3844>
They are planted<WH8362> in Yahweh<WH3068>'s house.<WH1004> They will flourish<WH6524> in our God<WH430>'s courts.<WH2691>
They will still bring forth fruit<WH5107> in old age.<WH7872> They will be full of sap<WH1879> and green,<WH7488>
to show<WH5046> that Yahweh<WH3068> is upright.<WH3477> He is my rock,<WH6697> and there is no unrighteousness in him.<WH5766>
